惜.definition: to cherish; to begrudge; to pity; Taiwan pr. [xi2]

惜命.definition: to be mindful of one's health and safety

惜售.definition: to be reluctant to sell sth

惜寸陰.definition: to cherish every moment; to make good use of one's time

惜才.definition: to have an appreciation for talent in another person

惜香憐玉.definition: see 憐香惜玉|怜香惜玉[lian2 xiang1 xi1 yu4]
